documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
grief.
*This was certainly the doctrine of my church. See Article XIII: “We are accounted righteous be-
fore God, only for the merit of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ by Faith, and not for our own
works or deservings. Wherefore, that we are justified by Faith only, is a most wholesome Doc-
trine, and very full of comfort . . . “ Scriptural support for this doctrine may be found in Mark
16:16;  John  3:16–18,  5:24,  14:6–7;  Acts  4.12;  Romans  3:9–26,  5:12–21;  Ephesians  2.12;  I  John
2.
